# Natural Weapon Augmentation, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** S, M

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Races of Eberron (WotC), pg. 188

As *[[Natural Weapon Augmentation, Lesser (Spell)|lesser natural weapon augmentation]]*, but you can choose any special ability whose market price is equivalent to a bonus of up to +5 or up to 200,000 gp, such as [[Vorpal (MagWpnSpcAb)|vorpal]].

*Material Component:* An ointment made from rare spices and minerals, costing 200 gp.

*Special:* Warforged spellcasters cast this spell at +1 caster level.
